#include<iostream>
#include<cstdlib>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    long int t,n,m,i,j;
    long int sum1,sum2,val,mark1,mark2,last;
    cin >> t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin >> n >> m;
        long int arr[n+1][m+1];
        long int ans=0;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            for(j=0;j<m;j++)
            {
                cin >> arr[i][j];
            }
            arr[i][j]=2147483647;
        }
        for(j=0;j<=m;j++)
            arr[i][j]=2147483647;
        int i1=1;
        int j1=0;
        int i2=0;
        int j2=1;
        int flag=1;
        while(flag)
        {
            flag=0;
            if((j2>=m || arr[i2][j2]==2147483647) && arr[i1][j1]!=2147483647)
            {
                ans++;
                i1++;
                flag=1;
            }
            else if((i1>=n || arr[i1][j1]==2147483647) && arr[i2][j2]!=2147483647)
            {
                ans++;
                j2++;
                flag=1;
            }
            else if(i1<n && j1<m && i2<n && j2<m && arr[i1][j1]<arr[i2][j2])
            {
                ans++;
                i1++;
                i2++;
                flag=1;
            }
            else if(i1<n && j1<m && i2<n && j2<m && arr[i1][j1]>arr[i2][j2] )
            {
                ans++;
                j1++;
                j2++;
                flag=1;
            }
        }
        cout << ans << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
